name: Shop Tycoon: Prepare your wallet
description:
Information

Do you want create a game store? Sex shop? Yes, Sex shop or a shop with alcohol? Or maybe everything together like Supermarket? Welcome to Shop Tycoon - where dreams come true.

Grow your store

Shop Tycoon (Shop Simulator) lead, manage, develop, and upgrade your own store. Choose the products and employees what You want. Increase your revenue to create best shop ever. After you set up cash registers and other basic elements you will be able to conduct your first transactions.

Features

  • Make larger more complex shop
  • The "Bandytko" & Bandytko Gang
  • Repair and improve the shop
  • Mouse, keyboard or any gamepad (full controller support)
  • Please, prepare Your wallet
  • Watch out for bandits and gangs
  • Build Game shop, Supermarket etc.
  • Relaxing music and sounds
  • Achievements
  • Hire and manage employees
  • Sell vodka (you can sell to kids)
  • 29 langauges
  • Save your business from bankruptcy and develop a successful, lasting Shop brand.

    The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.
